report design

Description:
Optional Y Series Grouping Sorting direction is Ascending by default.

Build number:
2.3.0.v20071211-0800

1. New a report with chart whose Optional Y Series Sorting is set to Descending.
2. Preview.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
